Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore scored the opening goal inside the first minute
Harry Wilson scored a stunning goal to double Wales' lead two minutes later
Driton Camaj scored a goal for Montenegro deep into the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in driving rain
Others: Wales made five changes from their previous match
Stevan Jovetic's effort from the halfway line came back off the crossbar early in the first half
Connor Roberts was forced to pull out just before the break, making way for Brennan Johnson
